description: A containment overlay that stabilizes emotional and civic structures. Often found in cities with Refuge or Sanctum archetypes. Associated with Shaiva lineage.
A catalytic overlay that initiates transformation through pressure or rupture. Linked to Crucible and Forge archetypes. Associated with Agni lineage.
A radiant overlay that signals clarity, identity, and civic direction. Found in Signal and Beacon archetypes. Associated with Solar lineage.
An ambiguous overlay that invites mystery, depth, and nonlinear transformation. Linked to Labyrinth and Mirror archetypes. Associated with Tantric lineage.
A mnemonic overlay that preserves lineage, memory, and semantic continuity. Found in Archive and Custodian archetypes. Associated with Vedic lineage.
